Name: Juliet
description:
Juliet is married with four children. She is a commercial farmer growing coffee for sale. Juliet is hardworking and shrewd in business. She works tirelessly on a daily basis on her farm to make sure her products are of good quality.

Juliet is seeking a loan to buy fertilizers and manure to apply in her fields so that the soil nutrition is improved to produce good quality coffee, which will out-compete others on the product market.

Thank you funders.
